entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are described as entities that guard the wizard prison, Azkaban. They are mentioned in the context of people who do really bad stuff.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is described as a wizard prison guarded by dementors.

entities.name: petunia
entities.description: Petunia is mentioned as hiding behind 667.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is being spoken to by another person.

relationships.description: Dementors guard Azkaban, as mentioned in the text.
